text: {"answer":"C","reasoning":"Option C is the only continuation that actually extends the argument by moving to an Article 14 taken with Article 8 heading and then explaining that, given a finding of a violation of Article 3 of Protocol No. 1, the Court finds it unnecessary to examine Article 8 (and thus need not rule on the joined preliminary objections). The other options are generic admissibility conclusions that do not match that transition."}
